Title: The River and Death
Writer: Luis Alcoriza, Luis Buñuel, Miguel Álvarez Acosta (novel)
Actors: Columba Domínguez, Miguel Torruco, Joaquín Cordero, Jaime Fernández
Plot: A useless and bloody vendetta has been going on for ages between two families in this mexican village. Men, sons, have killed each other for generations, for a so-called conception of honor...
